replies.body: Oh no, better not say there is something wrong with Riot, they will flat out deny and try to lay blame on you.

is there a reason why we cant get a ping bar at the home screen before you decide to play?

Also i just got kicked from champ select with 20 secs left over and now have to wait 6 mins for failure to pick champ.

Riot can you please fix

Thanks

time was 1850 western Australia time
